venue.name: The Healing Center at Our Weeping Angel Foundation

item.description:
Do you suffer from test anxiety, stress, insomnia ?
Would you like to improve self-esteem, enhance
athletic performance, cultivate creativity,
sharpen concentration, etc?

All this and more is possible when you learn how
to unleash the power of the mind!

In this experiential seminar, attendees will learn to
easily achieve a hypnotic state and to create safe,
effective suggestions to help them achieve their
desired outcomes.

"My goal is to help people increase their potential
of getting the best possible experience, to inspire
them to take action and create a positive change in
their life!" - Kathryn McGlynn

Tonight's seminar is donation-based, with a suggested
donation of $10.00. All proceeds benefit Our Weeping
Angel, a Hingham based non-profit organization that
helps people to heal with holistic health choices.

Call Kathryn at the number above to preregister,
as space is limited.

group.name: Past Life Regression & Professional Hypnosis Group

item.name: Learn Self-Hypnosis
